title: The PiG Daily #66 - Understanding Jargon Ep 1. Beginner Basics
excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR: "Worker Massacre" - Submit your games with huge numbers of workers dying. Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment.
